widget.name: Telerik.UI.RadMosaicHubTile
widget.title: RadMosaicHubTile
widget.description: RadMosaicHubTile is a grid of nine small tiles that individually flip themselves to display a random image. Every now and then, an image is selected and is displayed magnified by four tiles in one of the corners the mosaic tile.

property.name: flipMode
property.description: Determines how the cells of the mosaic tile are flipped.

property.name: tileCssClass
property.description: Gets or sets a custom CSS class that will be applied to each mosaic tile.

property.name: picturesSource
property.description: Gets or sets the images displayed by the tile.

property.name: updateInterval
property.description: Gets or sets the UpdateInterval in seconds. This interval determines how often the tile will update its visual states when it is not frozen.

property.name: updateDeviation
property.description: Gets or sets the update deviation in seconds. The number will be used to make each update happen at random intervals from (updateInterval-updateDeviation) to (updateInterval+updateDeviation). For example, with updateInterval=5 and updateDeviation=2, the update can happen at any time between 3 and 7 seconds.

property.name: isFrozen
property.description: Gets or sets the IsFrozen property. Freezing a hub tile means that it will cease to periodically update itself. For example when it is offscreen.

property.name: backContentTemplate
property.description: Gets or sets a value determining what the backside of the tile will render. The value can be either a string with HTML or a DOM element. If the value is an element, its inner HTML will be used as the template.

property.name: element
property.description: Gets the DOM element that hosts this control.

property.name: initialized
property.description: Indicates whether the control is initialized.
